channel.title: Forum of Lies 16.2 - (4/16) - END - Snails win!
channel.description:
Welcome to Forum of Lies 16.2!

Hosted by Eevee
Co-Hosted by Luxy and Marcus_Doodalee

Rules

Forum of Lies Official Hub Forum of Lies
Welcome to the wonderful wacky (And sometimes stressful) world of FoL! Useful Links Class Cards Thread! Spreadsheet of Complete, Ongoing and Planned FoL and SFoL games! Also includes information on how to sign up to host. The Forum of Lies Discord Server! A friendly “how to get started” guide by one of our own players! New player guide by our good boy General Gameplay Infomation Rules Follow the Global Forum Rules If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactiv…

Gameplay

Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies
Nights will be 1 IRL days long
Actions are done by messaging eevee/Luxy/Marcus
Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Forum Thread
Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Forum Thread
All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread 12
When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it

Executions

To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]”
Once majority is reached to accuse someone, a trial will begin.
Either after 24 hours or once a trial reaches majority on pardon/execute, the trial will end.
After the trial ends, the King has 12 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed
Executions end the Day

Journals

Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed

Players:

  1. overthebin - Noble - Dead n1
  2. Firekitten - Alchemist - Dead d2
  3. Alice - Mastermind - Dead n3
  4. techwolves - Priest - Dead n3
  5. Sam17z - Alchemist - Dead n2
  6. PoisonedSquid - Assassin - Dead n3
  7. Celeste - Mastermind - Dead d4
  8. NozBugz - Alive
  9. Solic - Alive
  10. Insanity - Hunter - Dead n3
  11. Frostwolf - Princess - Dead d3
  12. Livicus - Sheriff - Dead n2
  13. Wolfy - Knight - Dead n3
  14. Moleland - Mystic - Dead n2
  15. Htm - Alive
  16. bazingaboy - Alive

Backups

  1. Boss110
  2. Sketch
  3. MaximusPrime

Timestamps:

  1. Game start
  2. Wolfy has died, they were a knight Captain Snailbeard of the S.S. Salty Sailor
  3. Overthebin has died, they were a noble Stuart
  4. Night 2 result and BEAUTIFUL flavor

item.title: Forum of Lies 16.2 - (4/16) - END - Snails win!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Alice:

Except that you didn’t try at all. I shifted the wagon onto a Princess d3. I made a Hunter get bled from an Alch and a Squire get jailed and nearly executed, while the Prince, Sheriff, Mystic, and Priest were killed by normal means.

Yeah, you played well. I wasn’t disputing that.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum of Lies 16.2 - (4/16) - END - Snails win!
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Solic:

The claimspace was horrendous though, with all these BD uniques spawning.

Except that you didn’t try at all. I shifted the wagon onto a Princess d3. I made a Hunter get bled from an Alch and a Squire get jailed and nearly executed, while the Prince, Sheriff, Mystic, and Priest were killed by normal means.

eevee-sama:

Correct powerwolfing or powervillaging would win this game.

Which is what I was doing. Unfortunately I got bled earlier and I was essentially the only evil playing dynamically here. The rest were only sticking to the shadows.

Read full topic

You failed to vine Bazinga n1 due to him being jailed.

This was a surprise, but I would win the 1vs1 if I had a use of my kill, which I wouldn’t have for ages still but meh.

If we hadn’t lynched Marge, I might have had a shot or if I wasn’t quicklynched (again sigh) while I was asleep the last day.
